comments.body: Can you add [RETURN docs](https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/dev_guide/developing_modules_documenting.html#return-block) please? There is also a pull request out to [separate rds functionality](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/pull/25646); if there is return info you think should be added feel free to leave some feedback.

The documentation `Creates, deletes, or modifies rds instances...` wasn't really true before as the module also manages snapshots and facts. For thoroughness maybe also add `rds_snapshot`, `rds_snapshot_facts`, `rds_instance_facts` along with `rds_instance` as the modules to use instead (or in the deprecation message if not here).

I'm in favor of just deprecating this module, but let's get rds_snapshot in first.
Completely agree with this - suggests the need for a new PR to get the references to the other three modules in.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +22,26 @@    - This module has a dependency on python-boto >= 2.5 and will soon be deprecated.
    - The 'promote' command requires boto >= 2.18.0. Certain features such as tags rely on boto.rds2 (boto >= 2.26.0).
    - Please use boto3 based M(rds_instance) instead.
options:
  command:
